recipe_description: Laz Böreği in Turkish or Galaktoboureko in Greek is a dessert made with custard and filo. Unlike Napoleons or  Mille-Feuille, the custard is baked in the pastry. This dessert is a specialty in the region of Rize Turkey off the coast of the Black Sea where my father-in-laws family originates from.

list_of_ingredients.3: 1 red or green pepper, halved deseeded and sliced
